Reference

All functions

ANES1968

1968 American National Election Study

ANES2004_OOC

Issue scale data for the ordinal optimal scaling algorithm.

BAM()

Bayesian Aldrich McKelvey Scaling

BMDS()

Bayesian Multidimensional Scaling

CDS2000

2000 Convention Delegate Study

SOTUcorpus

Texts From the Presidential State of the Union Addresses

Sweden2010

Swedish Parliamentary Candidate Survey (2010)

aldmckSE()

Calculate Asymptotic Approximation of Aldrich-McKelvey SEs

asmcjr-package

Analyzing Spatial Models of Choice and Judgment with R

bamPrep()

Prepare data for Bayesian Aldrich-McKelvey function

bayesunfold()

Bakker-Poole Bayesian Multidimensional Scaling: Unfolding Analysis of Ratio-Scale Data

binary.comparisons()

Calculates a matrix of binary comparisons of stimuli

boot.aldmck()

Bootstrapping Aldrich-McKelvey Scaling Model

boot.blackbox()

Bootstrapping Blackbox Scaling Model

boot.blackbox_transpose()

Bootstrapping Blackbox_transpose Scaling Model

2008 American National Election Study

Chapel Hill Expert Study data

2009 European Election Survey (Voters, Denmark)

diffStims()

Calculate probability of difference between stimuli

doubleCenter() doubleCenter

Calculates a double-centered matrix

Fourth French Republic Roll Call Data

2009 European Election Survey (Voters, France)

Alternative plotting function for Geweke Diagnostics

Alternative plotting function for Aldrich-McKelvel Results
